member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation angle of outer labels. If not specified, labels are rotated at predefiend angles depending on bars' orientation and layout.

member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation angle of inner labels. If not specified, labels are rotated at predefiend angles depending on bars' orientation and layout.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users are allowed to rotate this chart.

member.summary: Gets or sets the angle where first data item of series should be drawn.
